TopicTitle: Sun does not illuminate atmosphere or surfaces in SSRSS

Articles.Content:
Happens regardless of if Eve is installed. 1.8.1 on windows 10

Edited February 25, 2021 by DAL59

If your running EVE (and I believe scatter to) with RSS, The EVE configs conflict with the RSS ones.
Easy fix,
Uninstall EVE (and maybe both Scatterer's) then try.
If this doesn't work Try taking it back to bare-bones RSS and see when it breaks.
Hope it helps
